produce from planters
, or buy from Trading Post

sandbox_1_venison.itemUsage: Ingredient that has a chance to drop when hunting.
sandbox_1_venison.itemDesc: Juicy and tender meat goes well with many different types of ingredients.
sandbox_1_venison.obtainApproach:
Obtain from defeating <Leporibeast Shorthorn> or <Leporibeast Longhorn> 
Produce from Corral
, or buy from Trading Post

sandbox_1_beef.itemUsage: Ingredient that has a chance to drop when hunting.
sandbox_1_beef.itemDesc: Leg meat attached to a big bone, with a naturally herb-like aroma.
sandbox_1_beef.obtainApproach:
Obtain from defeating <Mossback Beast> or <Lush Mossback Beast> 
Produce from Corral
, or buy from Trading Post

sandbox_1_poultry.itemUsage: Ingredient that has a chance to drop when hunting.
sandbox_1_poultry.itemDesc: The most delicious part of a Fowlbeast.
sandbox_1_poultry.obtainApproach:
Obtain from defeating <Luminous Fowlbeast> 
Produce from Corral

sandbox_1_supermeat.itemUsage: Rare ingredient that has a chance to drop when hunting rare animals.
sandbox_1_supermeat.itemDesc: It is highly sought-after by premium restaurants for its silky texture and rich taste.

sandbox_1_ttlmeat.itemUsage: Rare ingredient that has a chance to drop when hunting rare animals.
sandbox_1_ttlmeat.itemDesc: Chunks of meat fuse with cartilage into a unique blend both hard and soft. A wastelander favorite.

sandbox_1_water.itemUsage: Required for survival and development. Can be collected by deploying Crabbie Pumpies on Clear Water.
sandbox_1_water.itemDesc: Can be used as drinking water once purified, or used for facilities.

sandbox_1_egg.itemUsage: Ingredient commonly found in the wild.
sandbox_1_egg.itemDesc: Nutritious and easy to obtain, a popular food.

sandbox_1_mushroom.itemDesc: A great choice to add some flavor to a dish. Just be careful of poisonous mushrooms.

sandbox_1_peper.itemDesc: Chili pepper with a kick. Be careful of extra-spicy ones mixed within.

sandbox_1_sugar.itemDesc: A plant with sweet juices, named because its use as a seasoning was pioneered by the Sarkaz.

sandbox_1_horn.itemUsage: Rare ingredient that has a chance to drop when hunting rare animals.
sandbox_1_horn.itemDesc: Just a little bit of it will add its unique aroma to the dish.

sandbox_1_condiment.itemUsage: A seasoning you can find in the Strange Territory.
sandbox_1_condiment.itemDesc: Add this condiment to your dish during cooking to make it extra tasty. Very popular among the people.
sandbox_1_condiment.obtainApproach: Chance to drop from combat in Strange Territory

sandbox_1_food_0.itemDesc:
This is edible? 
 Well, it'll fill our bellies at least.

sandbox_1_food_1.itemUsage: Operator gains slightly increased Max HP and DEF from meal
sandbox_1_food_1.itemDesc:
Mixed grains with cragpincer meat added for a savory touch.
Cragpincers are tasty, but who was the first to try one?

sandbox_1_food_2.itemUsage: Operator gains slightly increased Max HP from meal
sandbox_1_food_2.itemDesc: Simple, ready-to-eat seasoned food, making it reasonably palatable. The original, unseasoned version was so disagreeable that it was classified as a dietary supplement rather than food.

sandbox_1_food_3.itemUsage: Operator gains reduced Deployment cost and slightly increased HP from meal
sandbox_1_food_3.itemDesc: The meat has been smoked to give it a rich pine aroma. Put a few slices on hot, steaming rice, and the scent of smoked meat fills the whole room.

sandbox_1_food_4.itemUsage: Operator gains increased Block Count from meal
sandbox_1_food_4.itemDesc:
All it takes is a few cuts and a quick rinse.
A controversial dish. Some claim to feel like they grew a shell like a cragpincer after eating it, which may or may not be an allergic reaction.

sandbox_1_food_5.itemUsage: Operator gains slightly increased ATK and ASPD from meal
sandbox_1_food_5.itemDesc: Ready-to-eat meat and grains, prepared at low temperatures to ensure freshness. Just heat and enjoy. The wonders of science!

sandbox_1_food_6.itemUsage: Operator gains slightly increased ATK from meal
sandbox_1_food_6.itemDesc:
Every country has its own ways of dining, and one is free to mix and match.
One would be well-advised not to try to put xiaolongbaos in wraps, or risk starting a riot.

sandbox_1_food_7.itemUsage: Operator gains reduced Deployment cost and slightly increased DEF from meal
sandbox_1_food_7.itemDesc: Made with whatever meat the hunter caught today. The size of the wrap is a symbol of the hunter's skill, though some secretly stuff more grains in to make it bigger.

sandbox_1_food_8.itemUsage: Operator gains reduced Deployment cost and slightly increased ASPD from meal
sandbox_1_food_8.itemDesc: Traditional Sargonian dish with tasty meat filling. A local favorite. Bigger is better!

sandbox_1_food_9.itemUsage: Operator gains reduced Deployment cost and slightly increased ATK from meal
sandbox_1_food_9.itemDesc:
The nutrients that the human body needs have been extracted from meat and distilled into a cube.
Unfortunately, its appearance is just as unappetizing as the name.

sandbox_1_food_10.itemUsage: Operator gains reduced Redeployment Time from meal
sandbox_1_food_10.itemDesc:
Made with a variety of different meats, offering a myriad of colors and flavors.
Part of the fun is digging through the rice to find your favorite meat.

sandbox_1_food_11.itemUsage: Operator gains reduced Deployment cost from meal
sandbox_1_food_11.itemDesc:
Drying is one of the oldest and simplest ways to preserve food.
A few small pieces hold a lot of calories, plenty to fill you up.

sandbox_1_food_12.itemUsage: Operator gains increased ATK and DEF from meal
sandbox_1_food_12.itemDesc:
Cooked at a low temperature, then lightly grilled for flavor.
It is difficult to tell what beast it came from, but it hardly matters as long as it is tasty and filling.

sandbox_1_food_13.itemUsage: Operator gains increased Block Count and DEF from meal
sandbox_1_food_13.itemDesc: Grains steamed in a crab shell, a regular sight on dinner tables in Sargon's rural areas. Those in the nomadic cities sometimes try some and find pride in Sargon's unique cuisine, but few among the tribes would agree with them.

sandbox_1_food_14.itemUsage: Operator gains increased ATK from meal
sandbox_1_food_14.itemDesc:
The culmination of developments in food technology, and the symbol of the modernization of food.
Food science products like these are key to feeling sated and getting the right amount of calories  in a short time.

sandbox_1_food_15.itemUsage: Operator gains increased ASPD from meal
sandbox_1_food_15.itemDesc: Highly concentrated essence of the flavor and nutrition of meat. Do not directly consume this concentrated solution, even if you live near a hospital.

sandbox_1_food_16.itemUsage: Operator gains increased RES from meal
sandbox_1_food_16.itemDesc: Extremely rich soup made by cooking under pressure for an extended period, made into solid stock. Rich and flavorful, yet melts in the mouth, as though you are eating a piece of cloud.

sandbox_1_food_17.itemUsage: Operator gains reduced Redeployment Time from meal
sandbox_1_food_17.itemDesc: Paired with mixed grains and nothing else, in order to keep the spotlight on the taste of the original ingredients. Low-fiber, high-calorie, and filling, modern nomadic city supermarkets never stock it, but it is a popular product for small shops in the wilderness.

sandbox_1_food_18.itemUsage: Operator gains increased ATK and ASPD from meal
sandbox_1_food_18.itemDesc: Made with whatever meat you can find in the wastes and fried with taters cut into all shapes and sizes. Nomadic city dwellers whine about how it's too greasy, but wastelanders who need to work all day love it.

sandbox_1_food_19.itemUsage: Operator gains greatly increased Block Count and DEF from meal
sandbox_1_food_19.itemDesc: Premium meat has been added to emphasize the flavor and nutritious value of cragpincer. A little-known fact is that it also tries to emulate the texture of cragpincer.

sandbox_1_food_20.itemUsage: Operator gains increased ATK from meal
sandbox_1_food_20.itemDesc:
Gel that retains consistency under room temperature and can be eaten directly. Soft, chewy, and very nutritious.
A good example of how high-tech food has lost its original flavor.

sandbox_1_food_21.itemUsage: Operator gains greatly increased Block Count and Max HP from meal
sandbox_1_food_21.itemDesc: A small piece gives you enough energy to last the day. Be careful about mixing them with sugar cubes. Accidental ingestion will not cause any immediate harm, but that is a LOT of calories you are taking in.

sandbox_1_food_22.itemUsage: Operator gains increased ASPD from meal
sandbox_1_food_22.itemDesc:
Meat sauce made from a variety of meats, with added nutrients, coloring, and flavoring.
It never expires thanks to the wonder of technology.

sandbox_1_food_23.itemUsage: Operator gains greatly increased Max HP and reduced Redeployment Time from meal
sandbox_1_food_23.itemDesc:
Comprised of protein, fat, and carbohydrates according to the needs of the human body. Easy to make and carry.
Often carried by explorers.

sandbox_1_food_24.itemUsage: Operator gains reduced SP Cost and Redeployment Time from meal
sandbox_1_food_24.itemDesc:
Food granules made with an appealing appearance to make the eater happy.
People trying to satiate their hunger and quickly get their energy boost, however, seldom notice.

sandbox_1_food_25.itemUsage: Operator gains increased Block Count and ATK from meal
sandbox_1_food_25.itemDesc: An ocean of aroma and flavor in every mouthful. Leithanians pair different music with different kinds of soup, even writing poems to the soup of the day.

sandbox_1_food_26.itemUsage: Operator gains increased ATK and ASPD from meal
sandbox_1_food_26.itemDesc:
The Essence of Savor was invented by a chef who had lost his sense of taste. His secret joy was observing his customers' smiles to determine whether they enjoyed his food.
A heartwarming story to everyone except his apprentices who have to taste-taste his new creations.

sandbox_1_food_27.itemUsage: Operator gains reduced Deployment cost and increased ATK from meal
sandbox_1_food_27.itemDesc:
Machine-cooled as soon as it has been cooked, offering a wonderful texture that is frozen on the outside but still warm on the inside.
Can also be enjoyed without cooling.

sandbox_1_food_28.itemUsage: Operator gains greatly increased Max HP and DEF and status resistance from meal
sandbox_1_food_28.itemDesc:
Made with fresh seasonal produce, delivering a treat for the eyes and conveying Zen through plating.
Higashinese chefs believe in achieving the best of both worlds in taste and appearance.

sandbox_1_food_29.itemUsage: Operator gains greatly reduced Deployment cost from meal
sandbox_1_food_29.itemDesc: Proper table manners are critical to ensuring a proper dining experience. Victorians are proud of their culture, never bowing their heads to anyone.

sandbox_1_food_30.itemUsage: Operator gains greatly increased ATK from meal
sandbox_1_food_30.itemDesc:
A dream in the cloudy mountains.
Tea, wine, wind, snow, you can taste it all.

sandbox_1_food_31.itemUsage: Operator gains greatly reduced SP Cost from meal
sandbox_1_food_31.itemDesc:
The color alone excites the mind and arouses the desire to have it, turning heads even if one has already passed it by.
A single sip fills you with energy. It has been in high demand due to rumors that the Radiant Knight drinks it.

sandbox_1_food_32.itemUsage: Operator gains greatly increased ASPD from meal
sandbox_1_food_32.itemDesc:
A Rhine Lab product that rearranges the molecular structure of food. The capsule is tasty and very filling, reducing food intake while maintaining the same amount of satisfaction.
Good for health, not so much for wellbeing.

sandbox_1_food_33.itemUsage: Operator gains greatly reduced Redeployment Time from meal
sandbox_1_food_33.itemDesc:
The pure appearance is soothing, but the flavor creates strange mental images... of explosions?
And why is it so damn sweet?

sandbox_1_food_34.itemUsage: Operator gains increased Block Count, DEF, and RES from meal
sandbox_1_food_34.itemDesc:
Tear open the package to find savory salted meat within.
Making good jerky requires just the right mix of temperature and humidity, but the upside is that it can be kept for years. The only problem is the toughness...

sandbox_1_food_35.itemUsage: When dining Operator activates skill, other Operators that have eaten this food recover a set amount of SP
sandbox_1_food_35.itemDesc:
Legend has it that a priest invented it after being inspired by an epic poem, in order to communicate what he felt.
Wait, there's alcohol in it! I'm getting dizzy already!

sandbox_1_food_36.itemUsage: Operator gains increased ATK and 'ignores a portion of enemy DEF' from meal
sandbox_1_food_36.itemDesc: A liquid extract of eggs marinated in pepper, minced meat, and wine. A portable version of the local favorite. Traditionally cooked via exposure to direct sunlight, so many nomadic city stores have professional sunlight directing equipment to recreate the technique.

sandbox_1_food_37.itemUsage: Operator gains increased ASPD and 'ignores a portion of enemy RES' from meal
sandbox_1_food_37.itemDesc:
A simple mix of smoked river fin and fresh fruits. 
To nomadic city dwellers, they're both expensive ingredients.

sandbox_1_food_38.itemUsage: Operator gains increased Block Count and +DEF Tenacity (reaches maximum bonus when missing a certain amount of Max HP)
sandbox_1_food_38.itemDesc:
Yanese households often stir-fry thin slices of meat together with all kinds of wasteland-grown vegetables, and this ketone is an essence extracted from the dish. 
What meats or vegetables should be used in it? Should it be sweet or salty? These questions are controversial topics in Yan.

sandbox_1_food_39.itemUsage: Operator is more likely to be attacked, gains greatly increased DEF and a certain chance to dodge physical and Arts attacks from meal
sandbox_1_food_39.itemDesc:
An esterase extracted by cooking meat with musical Originium Arts. 
Handling food with Arts is a feasible method during emergencies, but the ever-evolving Leithanians have developed the cooking process into a performance.

sandbox_1_food_40.itemUsage: Operator gains Vigor effect of increased attack when HP is above a certain percentage from meal
sandbox_1_food_40.itemDesc:
A dish passed down by Columbian mercenaries with a particularly crude process: fowlbeast meat is stuffed into a pile of 'safe' Originium and roasted within. 
It tastes subtle at first, but the fowlbeast flavor lingers on your tongue for a long time after.

sandbox_1_food_41.itemUsage: Operator gains slightly increased ASPD with every enemy kill that stacks a certain number of times (effect lost when retreated) from meal
sandbox_1_food_41.itemDesc:
This mix of smooth bean paste and aromatic sausages brings the other's flavor out and is a timeless favorite, but there's just one tiny thing: it's just a cube. 
Easy to store and carry, so its popular with wasteland travelers.

sandbox_1_food_42.itemUsage: Operator gains camouflage and ATK from meal
sandbox_1_food_42.itemDesc: Dancing around a fire with a whole animal roasted over it as its skin becomes golden crispy and the fat seeps out of it. This is the highest honor given to guests of the jungle clans. Finish the entire dish, and you will be the clan's hero for the day!

sandbox_1_food_43.itemUsage: Operator slightly increases SP recovery rate of allies within Attack Range (does not stack) and increases healing effectiveness from meal
sandbox_1_food_43.itemDesc: Legend has it they serve this at Victorian state banquets. Generous meat portions are chosen, marinated, and cured in a special tower. Different parts are handled separately and grilled with oil multiple times, but there's never a burnt taste to it. Rare to find.

sandbox_1_food_44.itemUsage: Operator gains 1 SP every few seconds, but automatically activates skill
sandbox_1_food_44.itemDesc:
A gift from fate after many failed cooking attempts. 
It can bring you to another land where time goes slow or fast, and perhaps with or without feelings.

sandbox_1_building_1.itemUsage: After deployment, produces a certain of <Rice> every day
sandbox_1_building_1.itemDesc: The stage of the cycle, and the beginning of Terran civilization.

sandbox_1_building_2.itemUsage: Can turn <Fresh Water> and <Iron Ore> into <Crude Gold>
sandbox_1_building_2.itemDesc:
A private metallurgy machine that enables the production of crude Pure Gold ingots.
Though less precious than Pure Gold, its value is still recognized in many places, such as among the mercenaries of the black market.

sandbox_1_building_3.itemUsage: Can turn <Fresh Water> and <Stone> into <Crude Gold>
sandbox_1_building_3.itemDesc:
A private metallurgy machine that enables the production of crude Pure Gold ingots.
Though less precious than Pure Gold, its value is still recognized in many places, such as among the mercenaries of the black market.

sandbox_1_building_4.itemUsage: Can turn <Fresh Water> and <Wood> into <Crude Gold>
sandbox_1_building_4.itemDesc:
A private metallurgy machine that enables the production of crude Pure Gold ingots.
Though less precious than Pure Gold, its value is still recognized in many places, such as among the mercenaries of the black market.

sandbox_1_building_5.itemDesc: A common detector Construct often built in the wastes. Wherever it towers up high is where enemies hide.

sandbox_1_building_6.itemUsage: Gains Camouflage for a period of time, provides visibility in an area, has increased range, and is more durable
sandbox_1_building_6.itemDesc: A common detector Construct often built in the wastes. Wherever it towers up high is where enemies hide.

sandbox_1_building_7.itemUsage: Provides visibility for the whole map, has Camouflage, and is more durable
sandbox_1_building_7.itemDesc: A common detector Construct often built in the wastes. Wherever it towers up high is where enemies hide.

sandbox_1_building_8.itemUsage: Blocks the enemy's path, forcing them to go around it
sandbox_1_building_8.itemDesc:
Transparent but rigid, just like the social distance and psychological defenses that city folk put between each other.
You're a nice person, but don't come any closer.

sandbox_1_building_9.itemUsage: More durable; Blocks the enemy's path, forcing them to go around it
sandbox_1_building_9.itemDesc:
Transparent but rigid, just like the social distance and psychological defenses that city folk put between each other.
You're a nice person, but don't come any closer.

sandbox_1_building_10.itemUsage: After deployment, allows ranged operators to be deployed on top
sandbox_1_building_10.itemDesc: A very common defense construct. Place it high enough and Operators atop it will gain a sufficient advantage in combat.

sandbox_1_building_11.itemUsage: More durable; after deployment, allows ranged operators to be deployed on top
sandbox_1_building_11.itemDesc: A very common defense construct. Place it high enough and Operators atop it will gain a sufficient advantage in combat.

sandbox_1_building_12.itemUsage: More durable; after deployment, allows ranged operators to be deployed on top, and increases their ASPD
sandbox_1_building_12.itemDesc: A very common defense construct. Place it high enough and Operators atop it will gain a sufficient advantage in combat.

sandbox_1_building_13.itemDesc: A defense construct equipped with a self-destruct device. When the construct is destroyed, the device activates and explodes.

sandbox_1_building_14.itemUsage: More durable; can block enemies from advancing
sandbox_1_building_14.itemDesc: A defense construct equipped with a self-destruct device. When the construct is destroyed, the device activates and explodes.

sandbox_1_building_15.itemUsage: Fires a net at an enemy in front, binding them for a period of time
sandbox_1_building_15.itemDesc:
Launcher that searches for enemies from above, firing nets that trap them.
The fire and blade-resistant nets once trapped its creator for an entire day.

sandbox_1_building_16.itemUsage: Fires a net at an enemy in front, binding them for a longer period of time
sandbox_1_building_16.itemDesc:
Launcher that searches for enemies from above, firing nets that trap them.
The fire and blade-resistant nets once trapped its creator for an entire day.

sandbox_1_building_17.itemUsage: Pushes an enemy in front away
sandbox_1_building_17.itemDesc:
Equipped with a can of compressed air that knocks the target back.
Does not deal damage to the target.

sandbox_1_building_18.itemUsage: Pushes away an enemy in front away with greater frequency
sandbox_1_building_18.itemDesc:
Equipped with a can of compressed air that knocks the target back.
Does not deal damage to the target.

sandbox_1_building_19.itemUsage: Gives an extra deployment slot each battle
sandbox_1_building_19.itemDesc:
Used to survey the surrounding area and reconfigure dispatch personnel, increasing squad flexibility.
There is strength in numbers.

sandbox_1_building_20.itemUsage: Gives 2 extra deployment slots each battle
sandbox_1_building_20.itemDesc:
Used to survey the surrounding area and reconfigure dispatch personnel, increasing squad flexibility.
There is strength in numbers.

sandbox_1_building_21.itemDesc:
Used to survey the surrounding area and improve dispatch personnel condition, increasing squad capability.
A wealthy man once bought it in the belief that it would increase his lifespan. No one knows if he succeeded.

sandbox_1_building_22.itemDesc:
Used to survey the surrounding area and improve dispatch personnel condition, increasing squad capability.
A wealthy man once bought it in the belief that it would increase his lifespan. No one knows if he succeeded.

sandbox_1_building_23.itemUsage: Can raise captured beasts; domesticated beasts have a chance to produce ingredients
sandbox_1_building_23.itemDesc: A pragmatic construct where you can raise various captured wild beasts.

sandbox_1_building_24.itemUsage: Slightly reduces the DEF and RES of enemies on this tile
sandbox_1_building_24.itemDesc: A bubbling dark quagmire seems awfully dangerous to face.

sandbox_1_building_25.itemUsage: Reduces the DEF and RES of enemies on this tile
sandbox_1_building_25.itemDesc: A bubbling dark quagmire seems awfully dangerous to face.

sandbox_1_building_26.itemUsage: Fires a smoke bomb at an enemy in front, inflicting Fragile
sandbox_1_building_26.itemDesc: Uses an ancient method of smothering the opponent's face with smoke. Very useful in many types of battles.

sandbox_1_building_27.itemUsage: Fires a smoke bomb at a distant enemy in front, inflicting Fragile
sandbox_1_building_27.itemDesc: Uses an ancient method of smothering the opponent's face with smoke. Very useful in many types of battles.

sandbox_1_building_28.itemDesc: Water continue to splash and soar, moistening the air. Standing next to it, you can feel a breath of coolness.

sandbox_1_building_29.itemDesc: The most drought-tolerant tree has been planted in the barrenlands. Even when storms strike, this plant will continue to stand.

sandbox_1_building_30.itemDesc: One of the most popular outdoor facilities. People often rest up on top to enjoy a rare moment of leisure.

sandbox_1_building_31.itemUsage: Can be used in battle to protect all Constructs.
sandbox_1_building_31.itemDesc: One of Rhodes Island's core constructs you can find across their regional branches, designed to withstand complex combat environments.

sandbox_1_building_32.itemUsage: Stuffed with tokens from powerful foes—some are warnings, while others are mementos; Raids will have a reduced appearance rate after deployment
sandbox_1_building_32.itemDesc: A display cabinet designed according to Sargonian customs, stuffed with tokens from formidable foes.

sandbox_1_building_33.itemUsage: Gains Camouflage, more durable, blocks the enemy's path, forcing them to go around it
sandbox_1_building_33.itemDesc:
Transparent but rigid, just like the social distance and psychological defenses that city folk put between each other.
You're a nice person, but don't come any closer.

sandbox_1_building_34.itemUsage: More durable, can block enemies, and deals high Physical damage to surrounding enemies when destroyed
sandbox_1_building_34.itemDesc: A defense construct equipped with a self-destruct device. When the construct is destroyed, the device activates and explodes.

sandbox_1_building_35.itemUsage: Greatly reduces the DEF and RES of enemies on this tile
sandbox_1_building_35.itemDesc: A bubbling dark quagmire seems awfully dangerous to face.

sandbox_1_building_36.itemUsage: Fires a smoke bomb at a distant enemy in front, inflicting Fragile that lasts for a longer period of time
sandbox_1_building_36.itemDesc: Uses an ancient method of smothering the opponent's face with smoke. Very useful in many types of battles.

sandbox_1_animal_1.itemUsage: Can raise beasts in Corrals; they will have a chance to produce ingredients
sandbox_1_animal_1.itemDesc: Its eyes reveal a longing for the wilderness.

sandbox_1_animal_2.itemUsage: Can raise beasts in Corrals; they will have a chance to produce ingredients
sandbox_1_animal_2.itemDesc: Its eyes reveal a longing for the wilderness.

sandbox_1_animal_3.itemUsage: Can raise beasts in Corrals; they will have a chance to produce ingredients
sandbox_1_animal_3.itemDesc: Its eyes reveal a longing for the wilderness.

sandbox_1_animal_4.itemUsage: Can raise beasts in Corrals; they will have a chance to produce ingredients
sandbox_1_animal_4.itemDesc: Its eyes reveal a longing for the wilderness.

sandbox_1_animal_5.itemUsage: Can raise beasts in Corrals; they will have a chance to produce ingredients
sandbox_1_animal_5.itemDesc: Its eyes reveal a longing for the wilderness.

sandbox_1_animal_6.itemUsage: Can raise beasts in Corrals; they will have a chance to produce ingredients
sandbox_1_animal_6.itemDesc: Its eyes reveal a longing for the wilderness.

sandbox_1_animal_7.itemUsage: Can raise beasts in Corrals; they will have a chance to produce ingredients
sandbox_1_animal_7.itemDesc: Its eyes reveal a longing for the wilderness.

sandbox_1_animal_8.itemUsage: Can raise beasts in Corrals; they will have a chance to produce ingredients
sandbox_1_animal_8.itemDesc: Its eyes reveal a longing for the wilderness.

sandbox_1_animal_11.itemUsage: Can raise beasts in Corrals; they will have a chance to produce ingredients
sandbox_1_animal_11.itemDesc: Its eyes reveal a longing for the wilderness.

sandbox_1_animal_12.itemUsage: Can raise beasts in Corrals; they will have a chance to produce ingredients
sandbox_1_animal_12.itemDesc: Its eyes reveal a longing for the wilderness.

sandbox_1_animal_13.itemUsage: Can raise beasts in Corrals; they will have a chance to produce ingredients
sandbox_1_animal_13.itemDesc: Its eyes reveal a longing for the wilderness.

sandbox_1_animal_14.itemUsage: Can raise beasts in Corrals; they will have a chance to produce ingredients
sandbox_1_animal_14.itemDesc: Its eyes reveal a longing for the wilderness.

sandbox_1_animal_15.itemUsage: Can raise beasts in Corrals; they will have a chance to produce ingredients
sandbox_1_animal_15.itemDesc: Its eyes reveal a longing for the wilderness.

sandbox_1_animal_16.itemUsage: Can raise beasts in Corrals; they will have a chance to produce ingredients
sandbox_1_animal_16.itemDesc: Its eyes reveal a longing for the wilderness.

sandbox_1_animal_17.itemUsage: Can raise beasts in Corrals; they will have a chance to produce ingredients
sandbox_1_animal_17.itemDesc: Its eyes reveal a longing for the wilderness.

sandbox_1_animal_18.itemUsage: Can raise beasts in Corrals; they will have a chance to produce ingredients
sandbox_1_animal_18.itemDesc: Its eyes reveal a longing for the wilderness.

sandbox_1_tactical_1.itemUsage: Slows the Movement Speed of enemies within range
sandbox_1_tactical_1.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, able to delay the enemy for a considerable time.

sandbox_1_tactical_2.itemUsage: When linked to other Support Coils, deals Arts damage by shocking passing enemies, and slows them
sandbox_1_tactical_2.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, able to create a deadly high-voltage current between two devices.

sandbox_1_tactical_3.itemUsage: When activated, explodes when an enemy passes by, dealing True Damage to all nearby enemies, and temporarily increasing damage that they take
sandbox_1_tactical_3.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, able to deal damage to the enemy.

sandbox_1_tactical_4.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, able to be deployed quickly to push away enemies.

sandbox_1_tactical_5.itemUsage: Explodes to deal heavy True Damage to all enemies within range
sandbox_1_tactical_5.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, capable of dealing heavy damage and destroying buildings.

sandbox_1_tactical_6.itemUsage: Inflicts Sleep on enemies in the 8 surrounding tiles for a period of time,  Special effect on animals
sandbox_1_tactical_6.itemDesc:
Originally used by hunters to put wild animals to sleep.
It has found use as a sleeping aid as well, though proper usage must be observed.

sandbox_1_tactical_7.itemUsage: Stuns all enemies in the four adjacent tiles for a period of time
sandbox_1_tactical_7.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, able to stun the enemy.

sandbox_1_tactical_8.itemUsage: Can be deployed on high and low ground. All friendly units in the surrounding 8 tiles gain Camouflage and are immune to Stun
sandbox_1_tactical_8.itemDesc:
Sunvalley Industries equipment developed to investigate Acidic Originium Slug habitats, camouflaging the user while providing defensive support.
It will at least help you keep your clothes on in a corrosive environment.

sandbox_1_tactical_9.itemUsage: Gives an Operator in front ASPD, and forces them to retreat when the effect expires (partial DP refund)
sandbox_1_tactical_9.itemDesc:
Suspicious ingredients, strong side effects, missing date of production and expiry date, and smells really bad to boot.
It was originally branded 'Extreme Energy Awakening Potency Excitement Explosion,' but was forced to rebrand due to false advertising.

sandbox_1_tactical_10.itemName: Wasteland Cache: Support First Aid Kit
sandbox_1_tactical_10.itemUsage: Restore a large amount of HP to 1 ally within range
sandbox_1_tactical_10.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, able to restore Operator health.

sandbox_1_tactical_11.itemUsage: Periodically restores SP to a friendly unit
sandbox_1_tactical_11.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, able to restore Operator SP.

sandbox_1_tactical_12.itemUsage: Immediately retreat the Operator in front and greatly reduce their Redeployment Time
sandbox_1_tactical_12.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, enabling quick movement of Operators.

sandbox_1_tactical_13.itemUsage: Periodically grants Barrier to a friendly unit
sandbox_1_tactical_13.itemDesc:
A portable shield generator.
It has been modified to automatically provide protection without manual command.

sandbox_1_tactical_14.itemUsage: Can be deployed on high and low ground. Restores the HP of the building in front every second.
sandbox_1_tactical_14.itemDesc:
Unmanned repair drone that automatically repairs damaged buildings.
It will automatically retreat once its set hours are up, staying away from danger.

sandbox_1_tactical_15.itemUsage: Allows <Fresh Water> to be gathered from <Clear Water>
sandbox_1_tactical_15.itemDesc:
Highly-effective automatic pump. Just deploy it near a source of water.
The form was originally inspired by metal crabs, but was modified after wild metal crabs began seeing it as a rival.

sandbox_1_tactical_16.itemUsage: Can produce <Gatherers> to gather from <Thickets>, <Monoliths>, and <Strange Ore Veins>, with a bonus when gathering from <Thickets>. Limit of 3
sandbox_1_tactical_16.itemDesc:
Assembly machine developed by Sunvalley Industries.
Produces mechanical workers that gather certain resources, saving on manpower. The higher the grade, the faster it gathers. Why does the newest model come with an especially shiny paint job?

sandbox_1_tactical_17.itemUsage: Can produce <Gatherers> to gather from <Thickets>, <Monoliths>, and <Strange Ore Veins>, with a bonus when gathering from <Monoliths>. Limit of 3
sandbox_1_tactical_17.itemDesc:
Assembly machine developed by Sunvalley Industries.
Produces mechanical workers that gather certain resources, saving on manpower. The higher the grade, the faster it gathers. Why does the newest model come with an especially shiny paint job?

sandbox_1_tactical_18.itemUsage: Can produce <Gatherers> to gather from <Thickets>, <Monoliths>, and <Strange Ore Veins>, with a bonus when gathering from <Strange Ore Veins>. Limit of 4
sandbox_1_tactical_18.itemDesc:
Assembly machine developed by Sunvalley Industries.
Produces mechanical workers that gather certain resources, saving on manpower. The higher the grade, the faster it gathers. Why does the newest model come with an especially shiny paint job?

sandbox_1_tactical_19.itemUsage: Constructs a platform on the water upon which any unit can be deployed
sandbox_1_tactical_19.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands. Constructs a platform on the water upon which any unit can be deployed.

sandbox_1_tactical_20.itemUsage: Captures any common quarry within attack range with less than a certain percentage of HP
sandbox_1_tactical_20.itemDesc:
A special metal trap that can withstand a wasteland beast's every attack. 
Place it in a place where beasts roam, open the trap, leave bait, and wait a while and you'll get a pretty good catch.

sandbox_1_tactical_21.itemUsage: Produces <Master Gatherers> to gather from <Thickets>, <Monoliths>, <Strange Ore Veins>, and <Lighting Ore Veins> with a bonus when gathering from <Lighting Ore Veins>. Limit of 3
sandbox_1_tactical_21.itemDesc:
Assembly machine developed by Sunvalley Industries.
Produces mechanical workers that gather certain resources, saving on manpower. The higher the grade, the faster it gathers. Why does the newest model come with an especially shiny paint job?

sandbox_1_tactical_22.itemUsage: Provides visibility within a certain range
sandbox_1_tactical_22.itemDesc:
A marking tool created with shiny ore. 
People often use this at night for light as it doesn't require any energy source. Wave it around in emergency situations to light up your path.

sandbox_1_tactical_23.itemUsage: Reveals the nearest <Buried Metal Chest>, <Thorned Treasure Chest>, <Fowlbeast's Return>, and <Historical Remains> and the area around it
sandbox_1_tactical_23.itemDesc:
A drone equipped with a special treasure hunting device. 
Machines like these are popular in mysterious Sargon—after all, no one knows where exactly the fabled treasures are lying in wait.

sandbox_1_tactical_24.itemUsage: Prevents the Operator in front from falling for a period of time, but forces them to retreat when the effect expires and increases their Redeployment Time
sandbox_1_tactical_24.itemDesc:
A stimulant that fills you to the brim with temporary strength. 
Widely used on the battlefield, but currently a topic of debate on whether that should continue.

sandbox_1_tactical_25.itemUsage: Applies Cold for a period of time to enemies within range
sandbox_1_tactical_25.itemDesc:
A wonderful can filled with artificial ice and snow. 
They used to use cans like these to create snow in films, until the day a certain prop master overstuffed one...

sandbox_1_tactical_26.itemUsage: Applies Frozen for a period of time to enemies within range
sandbox_1_tactical_26.itemDesc:
A wonderful can filled with artificial ice and snow. 
They used to use cans like these to create snow in films, until the day a certain prop master overstuffed one...

sandbox_1_tactical_27.itemUsage: Captures one common quarry within attack range
sandbox_1_tactical_27.itemDesc:
A special metal trap that can withstand a wasteland beast's every attack. 
Place it in a place where beasts roam, open the trap, leave bait, and wait a while and you'll get a pretty good catch.

sandbox_1_tactical_28.itemUsage: Prevents the Operator in front from falling for a period of time, but forces them to retreat when the effect expires
sandbox_1_tactical_28.itemDesc:
A stimulant that fills you to the brim with temporary strength. 
Widely used on the battlefield, but currently a topic of debate on whether that should continue.

sandbox_1_tactical_29.itemUsage: Prevents the Operator in front from falling for a period of time, but forces them to retreat when the effect expires and decreases their Redeployment Time
sandbox_1_tactical_29.itemDesc:
A stimulant that fills you to the brim with temporary strength. 
Widely used on the battlefield, but currently a topic of debate on whether that should continue.

sandbox_1_tactical_30.itemUsage: Increases the Movement Speed of surrounding enemies, but decreases their DEF
sandbox_1_tactical_30.itemDesc:
Unbalanced aromas can influence bodily control. 
This sort of strange vapor can cause people to quicken their steps, but also lose some of their defensive reflexes.

sandbox_1_craft_1.itemDesc: Marks on your map where you can find Wood in the Arsalan region.

sandbox_1_craft_2.itemDesc: Marks on your map where you can find Stone in the Arsalan region.

sandbox_1_craft_3.itemUsage: Lets you gather from [Strange Ore Veins]
sandbox_1_craft_3.itemDesc: Marks on your map where you can find Iron Ore in the Arsalan region.

sandbox_1_craft_4.itemUsage: Lets you gather from [Lighting Ore Veins]
sandbox_1_craft_4.itemDesc: Marks on your map where you can find Lighting Ore in the Arsalan region.

sandbox_1_craft_5.itemUsage: Chance to get extra ingredients when stage is completed
sandbox_1_craft_5.itemDesc: A bamboo basket used to collect scattered grains ensures the common people of the wastes do not have to ration their food as much.

sandbox_1_craft_6.itemUsage: Chance to get extra Constructs when stage is completed
sandbox_1_craft_6.itemDesc: A toolbox left by Passenger's mentor. It looks rusty and worn out, but the tools seem usable since it was stored safely in a high and dry place.

sandbox_1_craft_7.itemUsage: Small chance to get extra Crude Gold when stage is completed
sandbox_1_craft_7.itemDesc: How does one find pure gold within handfuls of sand? This tool is the answer.

sandbox_1_craft_8.itemUsage: Small chance to get extra Support Items when stage is completed
sandbox_1_craft_8.itemDesc: Recovering items left behind on the battlefield to reuse them later is also a type of science.

sandbox_1_craft_9.itemUsage: Trading Post has a higher chance for discounted goods
sandbox_1_craft_9.itemDesc: The trading post doors are always open for those with the proper papers.

sandbox_1_craft_10.itemUsage: Chance to refund all ingredients when making Provisions
sandbox_1_craft_10.itemDesc: Written by the High Priest himself, but if he's already written a hundred tips, why does he still need us to cook for him?

sandbox_1_craft_11.itemUsage: All Allied Operators take 10% less Elemental Damage
sandbox_1_craft_11.itemDesc: An alert mind can quickly alleviate the inertia from enemy attacks.

sandbox_1_craft_12.itemUsage: All Allied Operators gain 1 layer of Shield when deployed
sandbox_1_craft_12.itemDesc: Simple, fast, easy to use. Immediate setup, immediate defense.

sandbox_1_craft_13.itemUsage: Deserted Town expeditions give extra materials
sandbox_1_craft_13.itemDesc: Some seemingly useless experiences have their uses in the wastes.

sandbox_1_craft_14.itemUsage: When Eunectes is blocking an enemy, gains ATK +40% and recovers 2.5% Max HP every second
sandbox_1_craft_14.itemDesc: One of Eunectes's spare weapons. Never used until now.

sandbox_1_craft_15.itemUsage: All friendly units within Tuye's attack range recover HP equal to 6% of Tuye's ATK every second
sandbox_1_craft_15.itemDesc: A solvent concocted by Tuye that lets her take it easy in battles.

sandbox_1_craft_16.itemUsage: Melee Operators take 10% less damage and gain status resistance

sandbox_1_craft_17.itemDesc: Extremely rich soup made by cooking under pressure for an extended period, complimented with Eunectes's special touch. Seems tastier than usual.

sandbox_1_building_37.itemUsage: Proof of your victories in the Gitmalutu Gala
sandbox_1_building_37.itemDesc: This cracked shell holds a beating heart, its tremors showing surprising vitality.
sandbox_1_building_37.obtainApproach: Obtain by collecting all Gitmalutu Gala Champ Badges or from the Workbench

sandbox_1_tactical_31.itemUsage: Can only be used on grass tiles to attract 1 Originium Slug when triggered. Expires after 1 trigger
sandbox_1_tactical_31.itemDesc: A simple but sturdy slug trap made with materials commonly found in the wastes. When placed in areas frequented by slugs, these devices can yield surprising results overnight.

sandbox_1_tactical_32.itemUsage: Can only be used on grass tiles to attract 1 Originium Slug when triggered. Expires after 2 triggers
sandbox_1_tactical_32.itemDesc: A simple but sturdy slug trap made with materials commonly found in the wastes. When placed in areas frequented by slugs, these devices can yield surprising results overnight.

sandbox_1_tactical_33.itemUsage: Can only be used on grass tiles to attract 1 Originium Slug when triggered. Expires after 3 triggers
sandbox_1_tactical_33.itemDesc: A simple but sturdy slug trap made with materials commonly found in the wastes. When placed in areas frequented by slugs, these devices can yield surprising results overnight.

sandbox_1_slugitem_1.itemUsage: Can be used to grant an Originium slug a new Acquired Trait
sandbox_1_slugitem_1.itemDesc: A wonderful little tool that can help quickly train captured Originium slugs. Unfortunately, due to its substandard quality, it can only be used once.
